ygData.subject: RE: Adventure vacation in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I usually sell for my group, and they usually have stuff they ve held onto in the bank for me to sell.  Selling to a nearby merchant saves me from having
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
> At 12:46 PM 7/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >
> >Yes, there seems to be a random component too. Sometimes the
> >merchant by the Kelethin bank gives me the best prices if I
> >use the Charisma song, other times I have to trek over to the
> >Ranger's guild.
>
> Yer a Bard, aintcha?? Why aren't you talking to the Bard merchant? She
> always gives me the best prices (and my Gnome Enchanter, too).

I usually sell for my group, and they usually have stuff
they've held onto in the bank for me to sell. Selling to a
nearby merchant saves me from having to make multiple runs
between the bank and bard's guild while encumbered.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
